Params: {3: 'A tiny, dirty finger reaches out, scratching a scar onto the burnt wall.'}
{3: "In truth, she no longer remembers what day it is. Hunger and terror work wonders in shattering a child's thoughts and memories."}
{3: '"Once the CPF is activated, we\'ll be back." Someone said this to her, but who was it? Her father? Her uncle?'}
{3: 'She despises herself for not being able to keep the time... And the Corrupted that would sometimes stumble upon her always gave her quite the scare.'}
{3: 'She only knows that today is the "third day", but she has no way of knowing how many "third days"have passed before it, lost in memory.'}
{3: 'She despises herself so much that she could just die. Dying sounds good right now.'}
{3: "All the gilded stories her Grandpa told her of mankind's Golden Age aren't enough to cover up the rust of the scavenger's life she leads during the end of days."}
{3: 'Can mankind ever claw its way back to the Golden Age? Or at least a time when the CPFs still worked like they should?'}
{3: 'Those inimitable, intricate machines... We only remember the extent of their contribution when they stop working.'}
{3: 'Maybe I should just die. No one can fix the CPFs anyway.'}
{3: 'Maybe I should just die. No one will give me hope anyway.'}
{3: 'Maybe I should just die. No one will come and save me anyway.'}
{3: 'If I charge out this barricade, I can die.'}
{3: 'Shadows dance in front of her eyes, obscuring her vision.'}
{3: 'Like falling forward into a soft bed of quilt, she faints.'}
{3: 'After Liv performs a quick check, the team moves the girl, who had charged right into our arms, onto a cot.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Malnutrition and severe sleep-deprivation contributed to her current state...', 4: '3'}
{3: "Liv rolls up the hem of the girl's pants. The wound on her leg oozes black blood, a typical symptom of the first stages of Punishing Virus infection."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I see now. This girl doesn't look like she was living on her own in a den full of Corrupted. Someone probably left her here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'I clumsily piece together the electromagnetic rifle and make sure that the tungsten steel cartridge is installed correctly.'}
{3: "...It's been a long while since I last used what I learned in my first year at F.O.S. I'm getting rusty now... I'll have to start practicing like Chrome when I get back."}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: "What's the next exam on? Minesweeping in the bushes? Haggling with locals?"}
{3: '...Found footprints and the track of something being dragged.'}
{3: "...I thought we'd have to look further. Turns out it's not the case."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The team and I are en route.', 4: '1'}
